item.title: Changed Jekyll theme to end2end!
item.description: Last week, I suddenly felt the urge to change my personal web hosted in github. I had it running for quite sometime with HTML5 UP but it was time for some change!! Then I decided to try out Jekyll themes as Github supports it. Turns out there is a huge collection of themes on their site. Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll.
